name: CrappyBird (MisterGrouch)
description:
A difficult game where a bird flaps it's wings in order to get through gaps in pipes.

very simple try to beat Lu's highscore of 42 if you can get to:

 5 = you're alive

10 = you're good

20 = you're crazy

30 = you're insane possibly hacking

40 = you are godly

CrappyBird Beta v 3.1 now has an installer, some updates and features are just that you can play purely with the mouse now or keyboard or both! left/right click to flap and mouse 4/5 to retry (cause we know you definitely will be doing that a lot.) see if you can beat @lu1249 's High score of 42 and post it in the

general channel of the Ceptic Collective discord server who knows you might get a prize

https://discord.gg/uM8ujtC6Dt

this is my first time trying to make a game or code anything so that is one reason for the quality.
